+2: Up to one target legendary creature gains vigilance, lifelink, and indestructible until your next turn.
−3: Reveal the top four cards of your library. Put any number of legendary cards from among them into your hand and the rest into your graveyard. Create a Treasure token for each card put into your graveyard this way.

CARDNAME can be your commander.

trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{U}，{B}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·205 | Crumbling Necropolis | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: It's said the spirits of the drowned dead hang their lights from the shattered figureheads.
trans-unit.target: 据说溺亡冤魂都会将手中提灯挂在破碎船首像上。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·206 | Crystal Quarry | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Crystal Quarry
trans-unit.target: 水晶采石场

trans-unit.resname: DMC·206 | Crystal Quarry | Card Text | Paragraphs
DMC·206 | Crystal Quarry | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "How tragic that greed eclipses beauty."\n—Seton, centaur druid
trans-unit.target: 「美受到贪婪的遮蚀而失色，真是悲剧。」 ～半人马德鲁伊熙藤

trans-unit.source: Dragonskull Summit
trans-unit.target: 龙颅山峰

trans-unit.resname: DMC·207 | Dragonskull Summit | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped unless you control a Swamp or a Mountain.\n{T}: Add {B} or {R}.
trans-unit.target: 除非你操控沼泽或山脉，否则CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {T}：加{B}或{R}。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·207 | Dragonskull Summit | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When the Planeswalker Angrath called dinosaurs "dragons," the name stuck in certain pirate circles.
trans-unit.target: 自从鹏洛客安戈斯把恐龙称为「龙」之后，这种称呼便在海盗圈子中流传了下来。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·208 | Evolving Wilds | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Evolving Wilds
trans-unit.target: 成形野地

trans-unit.resname: DMC·208 | Evolving Wilds | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}, Sacrifice CARDNAME: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: {T}，牺牲CARDNAME：从你牌库中搜寻一张基本地牌，将之横置放进战场，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·208 | Evolving Wilds | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Every world is an organism, able to grow new lands. Some just do it faster than others.
trans-unit.target: 任一世界都是个有机体，能让新的地成长。有些只是作得比其他的都快。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·209 | Exotic Orchard | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Exotic Orchard
trans-unit.target: 异国果园

trans-unit.resname: DMC·209 | Exotic Orchard | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color that a land an opponent controls could produce.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点法术力，其颜色为由对手操控的地能产生之任一颜色。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·209 | Exotic Orchard | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It was a strange morning. When we awoke, we found our trees transformed. We didn't know whether to water them or polish them."\n—Pulan, Bant orchardist
trans-unit.target: 「那是个奇怪的早晨。我们醒来时，就发现树变了样子。不晓得该要替它浇水还是把它擦亮。」 ～班特栽果人普兰

trans-unit.target: 野心与背叛在纳雅并不常见，早已被对现世神明的崇敬猎捕得近乎灭绝。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·217 | Mikokoro, Center of the Sea | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Center of the Sea, Eye of the World, Shrine of Enlightenment. Seek it for answers. Seek it for healing. Seek it and return transformed."\n—Scroll fragment from the ruins of Minamo
trans-unit.target: 「御心是汪洋的中心，世界的眼睛，启蒙的殿堂。该地有所有问题的解答，所有伤痛的解药。之后你将超凡而归。」 ～水面院废墟的断简残篇

trans-unit.target: 动员城区

trans-unit.target: {T}：加{C}。 {4}：直到回合结束，CARDNAME成为3/3，具警戒异能的市民生物。它仍然是地。你每操控一个传奇生物或传奇鹏洛客，此异能便减少{1}来起动。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·218 | Mobilized District | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Sometimes the strongest weapon you can hold in your hand is another hand.
trans-unit.target: 有时候帮手就是你手中的最强武器。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·221 | Mystic Monastery | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: When asked how many paths reach enlightenment, the monk kicked a heap of sand. "Count," he smiled, "and then find more grains."
trans-unit.target: 「启悟之道共几何？」和尚闻言踢散跟前沙堆。「数数吧，」他微笑道，「然后找出更多沙粒。」

trans-unit.target: 圣物塔从前由圣物骑士守护，但如今保护它的只剩它与人世的疏离，任谁都可轻易掠尽它那积满尘土的珍宝。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·230 | Savage Lands | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Jund is a world as cruel as those who call it home. Their brutal struggles scar the land even as it carves them in its image, a vicious circle spiraling out of control.
trans-unit.target: 勇得这世界与其间居民一样残酷。各种野蛮搏斗在大地划下伤痕，大地则型塑这些蛮兽，构成无法控制的残暴循环。

trans-unit.resname: DMC·231 | Seaside Citadel | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: For wisdom's sake, it was built high to gaze on all things. For glory's sake, it was built high as a testament of power. For strength's sake, it was built high to repel all attacks.
trans-unit.target: 为了智慧，它建在高地来监看万物。为了荣誉，它建在高地以验证勇武。为了力量，它建在高地好斥退攻势。

trans-unit.source: Centuries ago, Shizo was a verdant field of wildflowers. After 891 samurai died in a single battle on its grasses, it became a haunted moor.

trans-unit.resname: DMU·28 | Prayer of Binding | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 既然杀不尽非瑞克西亚密探，就必须能将之看住。

trans-unit.source: "Spiritual wholeness is not something you can give to yourself: it is attained only through the divine blessing of healing another."
trans-unit.target: 「你无法自行获得心灵上的完整：只有用治愈他人的神圣祝福才能实现。」

trans-unit.target: 飞行 仅于你的每个回合中且限一次，你可以从你坟墓场中使用地或施放法术力值等于或小于3的永久物咒语。如果你如此作，则它获得「当此永久物从战场进入坟墓场时，将它放逐且你获得2点生命。」

trans-unit.source: Kicker {1}{U} (You may pay an additional {1}{U} as you cast this spell.)\nTap up to two target creatures. If this spell was kicked, put a stun counter on each of those creatures. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)\nDraw a card.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{U}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{U}。） 横置至多两个目标生物。如果此咒语已增幅，则在这些生物上各放置一个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。） 抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·35 | Take Up the Shield | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "You are all part of my pride. As long as I live, I will protect you."
trans-unit.target: 「你就是我的群伴。只要我活着，就会保你平安。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·36 | Temporary Lockdown | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Any one of us could be compromised," said Karn. "No one leaves until we know who can be trusted."
trans-unit.target: 「我们谁都可能是潜探，」卡恩说道。「在弄清楚谁值得信赖之前，谁都不许走。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·37 | Urza Assembles the Titans | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Urza Assembles the Titans
trans-unit.target: 克撒聚侠纪

trans-unit.resname: DMU·37 | Urza Assembles the Titans | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Scry 4, then you may reveal the top card of your library. If a planeswalker card is revealed this way, put it into your hand.
II — You may put a planeswalker card with mana value 6 or less from your hand onto the battlefield.
III — You may activate the loyalty abilities of planeswalkers you control twice this turn rather than only once.
trans-unit.target: 跳读（选择一个章节，此传纪一开始就有该数量的学问指示物。于你抓牌步骤后再加一个。跳过的章节不会触发。到III后牺牲之。） I — 占卜4，然后你可以展示你的牌库顶牌。如果以此法展示出一张鹏洛客牌，则将它置于你手上。 II — 你可以将一张法术力值等于或小于6的鹏洛客牌从你手上放进战场。 III — 本回合中，你可以起动由你操控之鹏洛客的忠诚异能两次，而不是只能起动一次。

trans-unit.target: 由你操控的其他士兵得+1/+1。 {3}{W}{W}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：在每个由你操控的士兵上各放置一个+1/+1指示物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·38 | Valiant Veteran | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Let them come. We will show them that Argivian steel is stronger than any Phyrexian metal."
trans-unit.target: 「让它们放马过来。我们会教它们知道：阿基夫的钢铁比任何非瑞克西亚的金属都要硬。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·40 | Academy Loremaster | Flavor Text

trans-unit.source:
Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)
I — You may cast an instant or sorcery spell with mana value 1 or 2 from your hand without paying its mana cost.

III — Exile target instant or sorcery card from your graveyard. Copy it. You may cast the copy.

(If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)

trans-unit.resname: DMU·54 | Impede Momentum | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Tap target creature and put three stun counters on it. (If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)\nScry 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put that card on the bottom of your library.)
trans-unit.target: 横置目标生物并在其上放置三个晕眩指示物。（如果某个其上有晕眩指示物的永久物将成为未横置，则改为从其上移去一个晕眩指示物。） 占卜1。（检视你牌库顶的牌。你可以将该牌置于你的牌库底。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·55 | Impulse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Impulse
trans-unit.target: 冲动

trans-unit.resname: DMU·55 | Impulse | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Look at the top four cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.
trans-unit.target: 检视你牌库顶的四张牌。将其中一张置于你手上，其余的牌则以任意顺序置于你的牌库底。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·55 | Impulse | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "I've always made snap decisions. I'm just better at making the right ones now that I'm older and wiser."\n—Teferi
trans-unit.target: 「我一向决断迅速。只是我现在随着年岁阅历增长，决断也越来越正确。」 ～泰菲力

trans-unit.source: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)\nScry 2, then draw a card. If this spell was kicked, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{G}。) 占卜2，然后抓一张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则你可以将一张地牌从你手上放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·56 | Joint Exploration | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Tolarians had the maps, but only the Yavimayans knew how to read them.
trans-unit.target: 地图虽在陶拉里亚人手中，但只有亚维马雅人才能读懂。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·57 | Micromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 1, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张法术力值为1的瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·57 | Micromancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ideas don't have to be big to be great."
trans-unit.target: 「想法不是只有声势大才会成效大。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·58 | Negate | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Negate
trans-unit.target: 失效

trans-unit.resname: DMU·58 | Negate | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Counter target noncreature spell.
trans-unit.target: 反击目标非生物咒语。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·58 | Negate | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "It's frustrating, isn't it, to be so weak and ineffectual? Don't worry, you'll be *compleat* soon enough."\n—Rona
trans-unit.target: 「眼见自己如此虚弱无能，是不是很不甘心？没关系，你很快就会完化。」** ～罗娜

trans-unit.resname: DMU·59 | The Phasing of Zhalfir | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Phasing of Zhalfir
trans-unit.target: 赛费尔跃离纪

trans-unit.resname: DMU·59 | The Phasing of Zhalfir | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)\nI, II — Another target nonland permanent phases out. It can't phase in for as long as you control CARDNAME.\nIII — Destroy all creatures. For each creature destroyed this way, its controller creates a 2/2 black Phyrexian creature token.
trans-unit.target: 跳读（选择一个章节，此传纪一开始就有该数量的学问指示物。于你抓牌步骤后再加一个。跳过的章节不会触发。到III后牺牲之。） I，II — 另一个目标非地永久物跃离。于你操控CARDNAME的时段内，它不能跃回。 III — 消灭所有生物。对每个以此法消灭的生物而言，其操控者派出一个2/2黑色非瑞人衍生生物。

trans-unit.target: 增幅{1}{B}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{1}{B}。） 抓两张牌。如果此咒语已增幅，则每位对手各弃一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·60 | Phyrexian Espionage | Flavor Text

trans-unit.target: 荷马利族的甲壳因要适应深洋水压而不断进化；等上到陆地后，就显得坚韧异常。

trans-unit.source: Karn's creation allowed him to monitor events across Dominaria—and everything he saw worried him.
trans-unit.target: 卡恩的造物让他能洞悉多明纳里亚每处动向～但所见发展都让他忧心忡忡。

trans-unit.source: The already spectacular views from the towers of the College at Lat-Nam are sometimes enhanced by glimpses of drakes diving into the ocean to devour small sharks.
trans-unit.target: 从大学院拉特南分院的高塔登高远望，其壮阔景象已然美不胜收；而有时还能看到龙兽俯冲洋面叼食幼鲨，更在秀丽画卷上增添生动点缀。

trans-unit.target: 飞行，守护{2} 领土～每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，展示你牌库顶的X张牌，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。由任一对手将它们分成两堆。将其中一堆置于你手上，另一堆则置入你的坟墓场。（牌堆可以是空的。）

trans-unit.resname: DMU·82 | Blight Pile | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Defender\n{2}{B}, {T}: Each opponent loses X life, where X is the number of creatures with defender you control.
trans-unit.target: 守军 {2}{B}，{T}：每位对手各失去X点生命，X为由你操控且具守军异能的生物数量。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·82 | Blight Pile | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Keep your distance. It may be broken, but it's far from benign."\n—Stenn
trans-unit.target: 「保持距离。它或许坏了，但远没到无害的程度。」 ～斯特恩

trans-unit.resname: DMU·83 | Bone Splinters | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Bone Splinters
trans-unit.target: 碎骨贯身

trans-unit.resname: DMU·83 | Bone Splinters | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.\nDestroy target creature.
trans-unit.target: 牺牲一个生物，以作为施放此咒语的额外费用。 消灭目标生物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·83 | Bone Splinters | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Steel may be more durable, but nothing channels the spite of the unjustly dead like bone."\n—Braids
trans-unit.target: 「钢铁或许更耐用，但还是骨头最适合传递冤死者的愤恨。」 ～布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: DMU·84 | Braids, Arisen Nightmare | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids, Arisen Nightmare
trans-unit.target: 觉醒梦魇布蕾德

trans-unit.resname: DMU·84 | Braids, Arisen Nightmare | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: At the beginning of your end step, you may sacrifice an artifact, creature, enchantment, land, or planeswalker. If you do, each opponent may sacrifice a permanent that shares a card type with it. For each opponent who doesn't, that player loses 2 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，你可以牺牲一个神器，生物，结界，地或鹏洛客。若你如此作，则每位对手各可以牺牲一个与之具共通牌张类别的永久物。对每位未如此作的对手而言，该牌手失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·85 | Braids's Frightful Return | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Braids's Frightful Return
trans-unit.target: 布蕾德惧怖再现

trans-unit.resname: DMU·85 | Braids's Frightful Return | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)
I — You may sacrifice a creature. If you do, each opponent discards a card.
II — Return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
III — Target opponent may sacrifice a nonland, nontoken permanent. If they don't, they lose 2 life and you draw a card.
trans-unit.target: 跳读（选择一个章节，此传纪一开始就有该数量的学问指示物。于你抓牌步骤后再加一个。跳过的章节不会触发。到III后牺牲之。） I — 你可以牺牲一个生物。若你如此作，则每位对手各弃一张牌。 II — 将目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。 III — 目标对手可以牺牲一个非地且非衍生物的永久物。如果他未如此作，则他失去2点生命且你抓一张牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·86 | Choking Miasma | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Choking Miasma
trans-unit.target: 窒息沼气

trans-unit.resname: DMU·86 | Choking Miasma | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Kicker {G} (You may pay an additional {G} as you cast this spell.)\nIf this spell was kicked, put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control.\nAll creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 增幅{G}（你施放此咒语时可以额外支付{G}。) 如果此咒语已增幅，则在一个由你操控的生物上放置一个+1/+1指示物。 所有生物得-2/-2直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·86 | Choking Miasma | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: The Phyrexians were as surprised as anyone to discover they still needed to breathe.
trans-unit.target: 非瑞克西亚人同样错愕地发现，自己依然需要呼吸。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·87 | The Cruelty of Gix | Card Name
trans-unit.source: The Cruelty of Gix
trans-unit.target: 基克斯暴行录

trans-unit.resname: DMU·87 | The Cruelty of Gix | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Read ahead (Choose a chapter and start with that many lore counters. Add one after your draw step. Skipped chapters don't trigger. Sacrifice after III.)
I — Target opponent reveals their hand. You choose a creature or planeswalker card from it. That player discards that card.
II — Search your library for a card, put that card into your hand, then shuffle. You lose 3 life.
III — Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.
trans-unit.target: 跳读（选择一个章节，此传纪一开始就有该数量的学问指示物。于你抓牌步骤后再加一个。跳过的章节不会触发。到III后牺牲之。） I — 目标对手展示其手牌。你选择其中一张生物或鹏洛客牌。该牌手弃掉该牌。 II — 从你牌库中搜寻一张牌，将该牌置于你手上，然后洗牌。你失去3点生命。 III — 将目标生物牌在你的操控下从坟墓场放进战场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·88 | Cult Conscript | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cult Conscript
trans-unit.target: 教派应征妖

trans-unit.resname: DMU·88 | Cult Conscript | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME enters the battlefield tapped.\n{1}{B}: Return CARDNAME from your graveyard to the battlefield. Activate only if a non-Skeleton creature died under your control this turn.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME须横置进战场。 {1}{B}：将CARDNAME从你的坟墓场移回战场。只能于有非骷髅妖生物在你操控下死去的回合中起动。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·88 | Cult Conscript | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: His eternal rest turned out to be more of a quick nap.
trans-unit.target: 他的长眠结果更像是小憩。

trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量与防御力加总等于或小于5的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·89 | Cut Down | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There can be no mercy, no half measures. When facing Phyrexians, it's kill swiftly or die."\n—Jodah
trans-unit.target: 「切勿怜悯，务使全力。对上非瑞克西亚人时，不先下手就会先阵亡。」 ～裘达

trans-unit.source: Menace\nAs an additional cost to cast black permanent spells, you may pay 2 life. Those spells cost {B} less to cast if you paid life this way. This effect reduces only the amount of black mana you pay.\nWhenever you cast a black permanent spell, target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains menace until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 威慑 你可以支付2点生命，以作为施放黑色永久物咒语的额外费用。如果你以此法支付生命，则该咒语减少{B}来施放。此效应仅减少你支付的黑色法术力数量。 每当你施放黑色永久物咒语时，直到回合结束，目标由你操控的生物得+1/+1且获得威慑异能。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·91 | Drag to the Bottom | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Windgrace's gladehunters hibernate in the quagmires of Urborg until the scent of Phyrexian technology awakens their hunger.
trans-unit.target: 风华的林地猎手沉眠在乌尔博格的泥沼之下，非瑞克西亚科技的味道唤醒了他们的饥饿。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·92 | Eerie Soultender | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, mill three cards. (To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)\n{4}{B}, Exile CARDNAME from your graveyard: Return another target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，磨三张牌。（磨一张牌的流程是将你牌库顶的牌置入你的坟墓场。） {4}{B}，从你的坟墓场放逐CARDNAME：将另一张目标生物牌从你的坟墓场移回你手上。

trans-unit.source: {B}: CARDNAME becomes a Human Cleric with base power and toughness 2/2.\n{1}{B}: If CARDNAME is a Cleric, put a deathtouch counter on it and it becomes a Phyrexian Human Cleric with base power and toughness 3/3.\n{1}{B}{B}: If CARDNAME is a Phyrexian, put a +1/+1 counter on it, then you draw a card and you lose 1 life.
trans-unit.target: {B}：CARDNAME成为基础力量与防御力为2/2的人类／僧侣。 {1}{B}：如果CARDNAME是僧侣，则在其上放置一个死触指示物且它成为基础力量与防御力为3/3的非瑞人／人类／僧侣。 {1}{B}{B}：如果CARDNAME是非瑞人，则在其上放置一个+1/+1指示物，然后你抓一张牌且失去1点生命。

trans-unit.source: Jaya did not want to die, but of all the things to die for, Dominaria felt right.

trans-unit.target: +1：每位牌手各弃一张牌。 −2：目标牌手牺牲一个生物。 −6：将由目标牌手操控的所有永久物分成两堆。该牌手选择其中一堆并牺牲该堆中的所有永久物。

(To mill a card, put the top card of your library into your graveyard.)\nCARDNAME's power and toughness are each equal to the highest mana value among cards in your graveyard.

+1: Reveal the top card of your library. If it's a creature or planeswalker card, put it into your hand. Otherwise, you may put it on the bottom of your library.

trans-unit.source: Domain — When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, if you cast it, choose target creature card in your graveyard. Return that card to the battlefield if its mana value is less than or equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control. Otherwise, put it into your hand.
trans-unit.target: 领土～当CARDNAME进战场时，若它经你施放，则选择目标在你坟墓场中的生物牌。如果该牌的法术力值等于或小于由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量，则将它移回战场。若否，则将其置于你手上。

trans-unit.target: 败坏魔索坎纳

trans-unit.resname: DMU·359 | Sol'Kanar the Tainted | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
At the beginning of your end step, choose one that hasn't been chosen —
• Draw a card.
• Each opponent loses 2 life and you gain 2 life.
• Sol'kanar the Tainted deals 3 damage to up to one other target creature or planeswalker.
• Exile Sol'kanar, then return it to the battlefield under an opponent's control.
trans-unit.target: 在你的结束步骤开始时，选择一项，且不得是此前选过的～ •抓一张牌。 •每位对手各失去2点生命且你获得2点生命。 •CARDNAME对至多另一个目标生物或鹏洛客造成3点伤害。 •放逐CARDNAME，然后将它在任一对手的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·360 | Soul of Windgrace | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Soul of Windgrace
trans-unit.target: 风华之魂

trans-unit.resname: DMU·360 | Soul of Windgrace | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Whenever CARDNAME enters the battlefield or attacks, you may put a land card from a graveyard onto the battlefield tapped under your control.
{G}, Discard a land card: You gain 3 life.
{1}{R}, Discard a land card: Draw a card.
{2}{B}, Discard a land card: CARDNAME gains indestructible until end of turn. Tap it.
trans-unit.target: 每当CARDNAME进战场或攻击时，你可以将一张地牌在你的操控下从坟墓场横置放进战场。 {G}，弃一张地牌：你获得3点生命。 {1}{R}，弃一张地牌：抓一张牌。 {2}{B}，弃一张地牌：CARDNAME获得不灭异能直到回合结束。将它横置。

trans-unit.source: As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose a card type other than creature or land.\nSpells you cast of the chosen type cost {1} less to cast.\n{1}{W}{U}: Exile Stenn. Return it to the battlefield under its owner's control at the beginning of the next end step.
trans-unit.target: 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择一种牌张类别，但不能是生物或地。 你施放的该类别咒语减少{1}来施放。 {1}{W}{U}：放逐斯特恩。在下一个结束步骤开始时，将它在其拥有者的操控下移回战场。

trans-unit.source: Land creatures you control have flying.\nWhenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if you control seven or more lands, up to one target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste. It's still a land.

trans-unit.resname: DMU·424 | Cosmic Epiphany | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Draw cards equal to the number of instant and sorcery cards in your graveyard.
trans-unit.target: 抓若干牌，其数量等同于你坟墓场中瞬间与法术牌的数量加总。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·425 | Tyrannical Pitlord | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Tyrannical Pitlord
trans-unit.target: 残暴暗渊王

trans-unit.resname: DMU·425 | Tyrannical Pitlord | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source:
Flying, trample
As CARDNAME enters the battlefield, choose another creature you control.
The chosen creature gets +3/+3 and has flying.
When CARDNAME leaves the battlefield, sacrifice the chosen creature.
trans-unit.target: 飞行，践踏 于CARDNAME进战场时，选择另一个由你操控的生物。 所选生物得+3/+3且具有飞行异能。 当CARDNAME离开战场时，牺牲所选生物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·426 | Ragefire Hellkite | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Ragefire Hellkite
trans-unit.target: 怒焰残虐者

trans-unit.resname: DMU·426 | Ragefire Hellkite | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flying\nWhenever CARDNAME attacks, you may sacrifice another creature. If you do, CARDNAME gains double strike until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: 飞行 每当CARDNAME攻击时，你可以牺牲另一个生物。若你如此作，则CARDNAME获得连击异能直到回合结束。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·427 | Briar Hydra | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Briar Hydra
trans-unit.target: 荆木多头龙

trans-unit.resname: DMU·427 | Briar Hydra | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nDomain — Whenever CARDNAME deals combat damage to a player, put X +1/+1 counters on target creature you control, where X is the number of basic land types among lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 领土～每当CARDNAME对任一牌手造成战斗伤害时，在目标由你操控的生物上放置X个+1/+1指示物，X为由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·428 | Llanowar Loamspeaker | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Llanowar Loamspeaker
trans-unit.target: 罗堰黑土语者

trans-unit.resname: DMU·428 | Llanowar Loamspeaker | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: {T}: Add one mana of any color.\n{T}: Target land you control becomes a 3/3 Elemental creature with haste until end of turn. It's still a land. Activate only as a sorcery.
trans-unit.target: {T}：加一点任意颜色的法术力。 {T}：目标由你操控的地成为3/3，具敏捷异能的元素生物直到回合结束。它仍然是地。只能于法术时机起动。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·430 | Resolute Reinforcements | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Resolute Reinforcements
trans-unit.target: 坚定援兵

trans-unit.resname: DMU·430 | Resolute Reinforcements | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Flash\nWhen CARDNAME enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.
trans-unit.target: 闪现 当CARDNAME进战场时，派出一个1/1白色士兵衍生生物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·430 | Resolute Reinforcements | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Morale rarely survives the sudden appearance of a squad of Sursi skirmishers at an army's flank.
trans-unit.target: 眼见侧翼杀出一队苏西侦卫时，鲜有军队还能留有战意。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·431 | Micromancer | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Micromancer
trans-unit.target: 微物术士

trans-unit.resname: DMU·431 | Micromancer | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: When CARDNAME enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an instant or sorcery card with mana value 1, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
trans-unit.target: 当CARDNAME进战场时，你可以从你牌库中搜寻一张法术力值为1的瞬间或法术牌，展示该牌，将它置于你手上，然后洗牌。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·431 | Micromancer | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "Ideas don't have to be big to be great."
trans-unit.target: 「想法不是只有声势大才会成效大。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·432 | Cut Down | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Cut Down
trans-unit.target: 斩落

trans-unit.resname: DMU·432 | Cut Down | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: Destroy target creature with total power and toughness 5 or less.
trans-unit.target: 消灭目标力量与防御力加总等于或小于5的生物。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·432 | Cut Down | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: "There can be no mercy, no half measures. When facing Phyrexians, it's kill swiftly or die."\n—Jodah
trans-unit.target: 「切勿怜悯，务使全力。对上非瑞克西亚人时，不先下手就会先阵亡。」 ～裘达

trans-unit.resname: DMU·433 | Lightning Strike | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Lightning Strike
trans-unit.target: 闪电炼击

trans-unit.resname: DMU·433 | Lightning Strike | Card Text | Paragraph 1
trans-unit.source: CARDNAME deals 3 damage to any target.
trans-unit.target: CARDNAME对任意一个目标造成3点伤害。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·433 | Lightning Strike | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Danitha watched in shock as electricity lanced from Jaya's fingertips, obliterating the charging Phyrexians. "What?" said the pyromancer serenely. "I told you I'd learned some new tricks."
trans-unit.target: 眼见雅亚指尖窜出闪电将来袭非瑞克西亚人劈散，达妮莎看得目瞪口呆。「怎么？」烈焰术士平淡地说。「告诉过你我学了新招数。」

trans-unit.resname: DMU·434 | Nishoba Brawler | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Nishoba Brawler
trans-unit.target: 好斗尼索巴

trans-unit.resname: DMU·434 | Nishoba Brawler | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Trample\nDomain — CARDNAME's power is equal to the number of basic land types among lands you control.
trans-unit.target: 践踏 领土～CARDNAME的力量等同于由你操控之地中基本地类别的数量。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·434 | Nishoba Brawler | Flavor Text
trans-unit.source: Though native to cold climates, the nishoba have adapted to more temperate environments since the Ice Age ended.
trans-unit.target: 虽然尼索巴原为长寒气候带生物，但从冰雪时代结束后，他们早已适应温暖环境。

trans-unit.resname: DMU·435 | Sheoldred, the Apocalypse | Card Name
trans-unit.source: Sheoldred, the Apocalypse
trans-unit.target: 启示天灾希欧蕊

trans-unit.resname: DMU·435 | Sheoldred, the Apocalypse | Card Text | Paragraphs
trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever you draw a card, you gain 2 life.\nWhenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当你抓一张牌时，你获得2点生命。 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，他失去2点生命。

trans-unit.source: Deathtouch\nWhenever you draw a card, you gain 2 life.\nWhenever an opponent draws a card, they lose 2 life.
trans-unit.target: 死触 每当你抓一张牌时，你获得2点生命。 每当任一对手抓一张牌时，他失去2点生命。
